title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Introducing the new Amazon SageMaker notebooks for analytics and ML (ANT212)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 介绍全新的 Amazon SageMaker 笔记本用于分析和机器学习 (ANT212)
abstract: Getting started with your data shouldn't require hours of setup or juggling multiple tools. Discover how the latest launches for Amazon SageMaker, including one-click onboarding of existing datasets and a new serverless notebook with a built-in AI agent help you move from raw data to production-grade pipelines and applications. We'll show you how our newest announcements translates into faster time-to-value, reduced operational overhead, and the ability to scale from exploration to production.
abstract_cn: 开始使用您的数据不应该需要数小时的设置或在多个工具之间切换。了解 Amazon SageMaker 的最新发布功能，包括现有数据集的一键式载入和内置 AI 代理的新型无服务器笔记本，如何帮助您从原始数据转向生产级管道和应用程序。我们将向您展示我们的最新公告如何转化为更快的价值实现时间、减少的运营开销，以及从探索到生产的扩展能力。
